node.title: West Auckland shooting: Gunman who was shot dead in stand-off named
node.description: The gunman who was shot dead by police in Glen Eden in West Auckland on Monday morning has been named.
node.content:
["The gunman who was shot dead by police in Glen Eden in West Auckland on Monday morning has been named.", "", "
Police were called to Danube Lane in Glen Eden on the morning of 29 November after reports of shots being fired. Photo: RNZ / Marika Khabazi
", "He was 55-year-old Tex Witika, also known as Rex.", "He was killed and three officers were shot and injured in the stand-off.", "Police were called to the property on Danube Lane in Glen Eden at 8.17am after reports of a house fire and a man discharging a firearm.", "The house was engulfed in flames when police arrived.", "They tried to engage the man to disarm over 30 minutes but he became increasingly agitated and aggressive, Police Commissioner Andrew Coster said earlier this week.", "More to come..."]
